mapper.insert: insert into fenny_study(member_id, study_title, study_content, study_image, study_reveal, study_display_date_start, study_display_date_end, study_share, study_hashtag, study_category, share_id1, share_id2, share_id3, share_id4, share_id5) values(#{member_id}, #{study_title}, #{study_content}, #{study_image}, #{study_reveal}, #{study_display_date_start}, #{study_display_date_end}, #{study_share}, #{study_hashtag}, #{study_category}, #{share_id1}, #{share_id2}, #{share_id3}, #{share_id4}, #{share_id5})
mapper.delete: delete from fenny_study where study_idx in (#{study_idx})
mapper.insert: insert into fenny_study_like(study_idx, click_id, like_yn) values(#{study_idx}, #{click_id}, like_yn)
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id AS member_id FROM fenny_member m LEFT JOIN fenny_study_share s ON m.member_id = s.to_id WHERE s.to_id IS NULL AND m.member_id != #{member_id};
mapper.insert: insert into fenny_study_share(study_idx, member_id, to_id) values(#{study_idx}, #{member_id}, #{to_id})
mapper.delete: delete from fenny_study_share where study_idx=#{study_idx} and to_id=#{to_id}
